title: Essays critical and imaginative,
author: Wilson, John
snippet: Torsonce is an admirable inn ; but the Tits are swinging along at eight knots ; and sylvan Stow, with its knoll- climbing cottages, brown kirk, and pear- tree-blossoming manse, in which, after morning prayer, the worthy pastor is issuing for a stroll in his garden, is no sooner come than gone ; and we cannot help forgetting it in this longline  of woods.

title: The works of Professor Wilson of the University of Edinburgh,
author: Wilson, John
snippet: Torsonce is an admirable inn ; but the Tits are swinging along at eight knots ; and sylvan Stow, with its knoll-climbing cottages, brown kirk, and pear- tree-blossoming manse, in which, after morning prayer, the worthy pastor is issuing for a stroll in his garden, is no sooner come than gone ; and we cannot help forgetting it in this long line of woods.

title: Memoirs of the life of Sir Walter Scott,
author: Lockhart, J. G.
snippet: My two girls met me at Torsonce, which was a pleasant surprise, and we returned in the sociable all together.
